summary: OpenClaw ecosystem research for AgentSorted content and tools pages

hosting_options.name: Oracle Cloud Always Free
hosting_options.bonus: Can run local AI models (Ollama) for completely free AI
hosting_options.notes: Community top pick for free tier. Sign-up can be finicky, capacity sometimes limited in some regions.
hosting_options.recommended_for: Technical users who want zero running costs

hosting_options.name: Hetzner VPS
hosting_options.notes: Most popular choice in the OpenClaw community. Docker setup with guide.

hosting_options.name: Railway
hosting_options.bonus: One-click deploy, no Docker knowledge needed
hosting_options.notes: Easiest setup of all options. Great for non-technical users.
hosting_options.recommended_for: Non-technical users who want cloud setup with minimal hassle

hosting_options.name: Northflank
hosting_options.notes: Similar to Railway, slightly more enterprise-focused.

hosting_options.name: Ampere.sh
hosting_options.bonus: Built specifically for OpenClaw. Includes AI credits.
hosting_options.notes: Most premium hosted option. Has affiliate program — 30% recurring commission.
hosting_options.recommended_for: Users who want a fully managed, hassle-free experience

hosting_options.name: DigitalOcean
hosting_options.notes: Good balance of ease and control. Trusted enterprise brand.
hosting_options.recommended_for: Users who want reliability and easy setup

hosting_options.name: Hostinger VPS
hosting_options.bonus: Docker template pre-configured. Often has discount codes.
hosting_options.notes: Good entry-level option. Regular promotional pricing available.
hosting_options.recommended_for: Budget-conscious users who still want managed setup

hosting_options.name: Mac mini (local)
hosting_options.bonus: No internet dependency. Works during load shedding (with UPS). Full local privacy.
hosting_options.notes: Best for SA context: power outages, data privacy, no rand exchange rate exposure. Uses ~6W power.
hosting_options.recommended_for: SA businesses prioritising reliability, privacy, and local data

hosting_options.name: Fly.io
hosting_options.bonus: Global edge network. Low latency from SA.
hosting_options.notes: Has a free allowance. CLI-based setup requires some technical knowledge.
hosting_options.recommended_for: Developers who want low cost + global infrastructure

ai_models.name: Claude Sonnet
ai_models.notes: Current default in most OpenClaw setups. Best balance of intelligence and cost.

ai_models.name: Claude Opus
ai_models.notes: Most capable but more expensive. Worth it for complex automations.

ai_models.name: GPT-4o
ai_models.notes: Good alternative to Claude. Strong coding and structured output.

ai_models.name: Gemini 2.0 Flash
ai_models.notes: Very cheap. Great for high-frequency cron jobs that don't need top intelligence.

ai_models.name: Ollama (local models)
ai_models.notes: Runs completely locally on Oracle Cloud free tier or Mac mini. No API costs. Needs decent hardware.

messaging_platforms.name: Telegram
messaging_platforms.notes: Easiest setup. Create a bot token, done. Most popular choice.

messaging_platforms.name: WhatsApp
messaging_platforms.notes: Scan QR code to link. Extremely useful for SA businesses — WhatsApp is dominant here.

messaging_platforms.name: Discord
messaging_platforms.notes: Great for team use. Set up in a private server.

messaging_platforms.name: iMessage
messaging_platforms.notes: macOS only. Native Apple Messages integration.

messaging_platforms.name: Signal
messaging_platforms.notes: Most private option. signal-cli setup required.

notable_skills.name: Google Workspace (gog)
notable_skills.what: Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Contacts, Docs, Sheets

notable_skills.name: Notion
notable_skills.what: Create and manage Notion pages and databases

notable_skills.name: GitHub
notable_skills.what: Issues, PRs, CI runs, API queries

notable_skills.name: Weather
notable_skills.what: Current weather and forecasts via Open-Meteo

notable_skills.name: Summarize
notable_skills.what: Summarize URLs, podcasts, YouTube videos, local files

notable_skills.name: Image Gen
notable_skills.what: Generate images via OpenAI Images API
